name: autoConnect
description: Automatically attempt to connect to a party server from the main menu, 0 = disabled, 1 = enabled, 2 = enabled w/ custom match

name: cc_linger_time
description: Close caption linger time in seconds.

name: cc_predisplay_time
description: Close caption delay in seconds before showing caption.

name: cc_text_size
description: Changes the size of subtitles and closed captions text. 0 = normal, 1 = large, 2 = huge.

name: cl_comms_filter
description: -1 = everyone, 0 = nobody, 1 = friends, 2 = party members. Anyone not matching criteria will be muted by default.

name: cl_ipgeo_country
description: IP Geo based country code of the client

name: cl_lagcompensation
description: Perform server side lag compensation of weapon firing events.

name: cl_liveapi_allow_requests
description: [LiveAPI] Allow processing and running any incoming requests.

name: cl_liveapi_enabled
description: [LiveAPI] Global State

name: cl_liveapi_pretty_print_log
description: [LiveAPI] Makes the JSON output more human-readable

name: cl_liveapi_requests_psk
description: [LiveAPI] A preshared key that will be used to validate requests. When set, if a request is received that does not match, it is rejected

name: cl_liveapi_requests_psk_tries
description: [LiveAPI] Attempts allowed when making a request with the wrong key before the connection is dropped.

name: cl_liveapi_use_protobuf
description: [LiveAPI] Use protobuf as the serialization format. Otherwise, use JSON.

name: cl_liveapi_use_websocket
description: [LiveAPI] Use bidirectional websocket layer

name: cl_liveapi_write_event_file
description: [LiveAPI] Write a per-session file with the LiveAPI events.

name: cl_liveapi_ws_event_delay
description: [LiveAPI] Delay to be used when broadcasting an event

name: cl_liveapi_ws_keepalive
description: [LiveAPI] Interval of time to send Pong to any connected server

name: cl_liveapi_ws_lax_ssl
description: [LiveAPI] Skip SSL certificate validation for all connections. Allows the use of self-signed certificates

name: cl_liveapi_ws_retry_count
description: [LiveAPI] Amount of times to retry connecting before marking the connection as unavailable

name: cl_liveapi_ws_retry_time
description: [LiveAPI] Time between retries

name: cl_liveapi_ws_servers
description: [LiveAPI] Comma separated list of addresses to connect to. Must be in the form 'ws://domain.com:portNum'

name: cl_liveapi_ws_timeout
description: [LiveAPI] Websocket connection timeout in seconds

name: cl_matchmaking_timeout
description: Total time allowed for the client to resend the 'connect' attempt when matchmaking

name: cl_observer_preset_playerHash
description: Used to override the target player when playing as observer in Private/Custom Match

name: cl_observer_preset_playerSlot
description: Used to override the player slot for the team, only used if 'cl_observer_preset_team' is >= 0

name: cl_observer_preset_team
description: Used to override an observers target team (-1 uses previous behavior)

name: cl_particle_fallback_base
description: Base for falling back to cheaper effects under load.

name: cl_particle_fallback_multiplier
description: Multiplier for falling back to cheaper effects under load.

name: cl_predict
description: Perform client side prediction.

name: cl_predictweapons
description: Perform client side prediction of weapon effects.

name: cl_ranked_reconnect_timeout
description: Total time allowed for the client to resend the 'connect' attempt when matchmaking

name: cl_resend
description: Delay in seconds before the client will resend the 'connect' attempt

name: cl_resend_timeout
description: Total time allowed for the client to resend the 'connect' attempt when matchmaking

name: cl_showpos
description: Draw current position at top of screen

name: cl_showtime
description: Draw current demo time if recording a demo

name: clientport
description: Host game client port

name: closecaption
description: Enable close captioning. 1 = dialogue only, 2 = dialogue and sound effects.

name: communicationBlock_time_to_unblock
description: Int timestamp indicating expiration of the comm block

name: community
description: Our current community

name: CrossPlay_user_optin
description: Our Crossplay opt-in preference

name: developer
description: Set developer message level

name: discord_updatePresence
description: Enable discord rich presence.

name: dvs_enable
description: Enable dynamic viewport scaling.

name: enable_non_fatal_error_reports
description: If disabled, will turn off non-fatal error reports being sent to devnet or backtrace

name: first_time_player_state
description: The current stage a new user is at

name: firsttime_mp_message
description: first time joining multiplayer

name: fov_disableAbilityScaling
description: Disable fov scaling for abilities

name: fps_max
description: Frame rate limiter. -1 indicates use the desktop refresh. 0 is unlocked.

name: gameCursor_Velocity
description: Game cursor velocity under joystick control

name: gamepad_ads_advanced_sensitivity_scalar_0
description: Gamepad ads sensitivity for 1x scopes / ironsights.

name: gamepad_aim_assist_ads_high_power_scopes
description: Gamepad uses aim assist in ADS with high powered scopes

name: gamepad_aim_assist_ads_low_power_scopes
description: Gamepad uses aim assist in ADS with low powered scopes

name: gamepad_aim_assist_hip_high_power_scopes
description: Gamepad uses aim assist in Hip with high powered scopes

name: gamepad_aim_assist_hip_low_power_scopes
description: Gamepad uses aim assist in Hip with low powered scopes

name: gamepad_aim_assist_melee
description: Gamepad uses aim assist with melee weapons

name: gamepad_button_layout
description: Gamepad button layout (used by menus)

name: gamepad_buttons_are_southpaw
description: Gamepad button layouts should use southpaw variants (used by menus)

name: gamepad_stick_layout
description: Gamepad stick layout (used by menus)

name: gamepad_use_per_scope_sensitivity_scalars
description: Gamepad uses the per scope scalars

name: gamepad_use_type
description: Gamepad use scheme (used by menus), 0: hold use, tap reload, 1: tap use, hold reload, 2: tap use/reload

name: gamma_adjusted
description: Whether player has done gamma adjustment

name: gfx_nvnUseLowLatency
description: enables Nvidia Low Latency SDK

name: gfx_nvnUseLowLatencyBoost
description: enables Low Latency Boost

name: host_flush_threshold
description: Memory threshold below which the host should flush caches between server instances

name: host_map
description: Current map name.

name: hostname
description: Hostname for server.

name: hud_setting_healthUseOnHold
description: use health by holding button

name: hud_setting_healthWheelToggle
description: toggle health wheel on press

name: hud_setting_healthWheelUseOnRelease
description: use health after selecting it

name: hud_setting_ordnanceUseOnHold
description: use ordnance by holding button

name: hud_setting_ordnanceWheelToggle
description: toggle ordnance wheel on press

name: hud_setting_ordnanceWheelUseOnRelease
description: use ordnance after selecting it

name: hud_setting_pingWheelToggle
description: toggle ping wheel on press

name: intro_viewed
description: Whether the introduction video has been viewed by this player

name: Invite_Flyout_Off
description: Used to disable Invite Fly Outs.

name: joy_inverty
description: Whether to invert the Y axis of the joystick for looking.

name: joy_legacy
description: Turn on/off 'Legacy' mapping for control sticks.

name: joy_movement_stick
description: Which stick controls movement (0 is left stick)

name: joy_rumble
description: Controller rumble. 0: off, 1: on (default).

name: laserSightColor
description: Custom Laser Sight Color

name: laserSightColorCustomized
description: Custom Laser Sight Color Enabled

name: locationInfo
description: What OS(on PC and Durango) or PSN account(on PS4) reports as the user's location

name: locationInfo_nucleus
description: What origin(on PC) or nucleus(on console) reports as the user's location

name: m_acceleration
description: Mouse acceleration.

name: m_invert_pitch
description: Whether to invert the pitch axis of the mouse.

name: mat_syncGPU
description: If true, syncs the render thread to the GPU at the end of each frame, instead of letting the render thread get one frame ahead.

name: match_allowMapRotationPreloading
description: Allow the server to change currently loaded map based on map rotation times

name: match_myBestDatacenter
description: Which datacenter we have the lowest ping to

name: match_myDatacenter
description: Which datacenter we prefer (same as match_myBestDatacenter unless user changes it)

name: match_myRankedDatacenter
description: Which datacenter we prefer for Ranked play (same as match_myBestDatacenter unless user changes it)

name: match_partyChangeNum
description: The int that represents the change num of our party struct (did it change?)

name: match_partySize
description: The size of our party

name: match_partySub
description: The name of our party subscription

name: match_playlist
description: The playlist we are looking for

name: match_precachemapOnMismatch
description: Whether to re-precache the map on mismatch between engine and matchmaking

name: match_roleToken
description: The role token used when matchmaking (e.g. for private match).

name: match_searching
description: Whether or not we want the system to be actively searching right now

name: match_searchInterval
description: How often to repeat searches

name: match_teamNoFill
description: If set, matchmaking won't fill the player's team with non-party members

name: mem_saving_release_mb
description: Amount of free mem that stops memory saving (in MB). Should be higher than mem_saving_trigger_mb + mem_saving_request_mb to prevent thrashing

name: mem_saving_request_mb
description: Amount of memory to request from streaming systems when saving is active (in MB)

name: mem_saving_trigger_mb
description: Amount of free mem that triggers memory saving (in MB)

name: mem_saving_use_factor
description: Memory saving will not trigger unless streamers are using a total of (mem_saving_use_factor * mem_saving_request_mb)

name: miles_channels
description: Number of audio channels, commonly 2(stereo), 6(5.1), 8(7.1). (0 is default)

name: miles_driver
description: Options are 'wasapi' (default), 'xaudio2', 'directsound', 'wasapi_ss', 'null'

name: miles_init_null_fallback
description: Start with null driver if driver creation fails (allows game to boot with no sound devices)

name: miles_language
description: Language to use for audio (requires a miles restart to change.)

name: miles_output_device
description: empty = default

name: miles_recreate_on_default_changed
description: Recreate driver when swapping devices with miles_output_device set to default

name: mouse_sensitivity
description: Mouse sensitivity.

name: mouse_use_per_scope_sensitivity_scalars
description: Uses the per scope scalars

name: mouse_zoomed_sensitivity_scalar_0
description: Mouse sensitivity.

name: mp_player_level
description: To read mp player level in SP

name: name
description: Current user name

name: net_bindToSpecificAddress
description: Only bind to a certain interface

name: net_minimumPacketLossDC
description: The lowest packet loss we have to any datacenter

name: net_queuedPackets_emptyQueueSleep
description: Can't be changed at runtime

name: net_recvBufferSizeOverride
description: Override the default receive socket buffer size

name: net_showsplits
description: Show info about packet splits

name: net_showudp
description: Dump UDP packets summary to console

name: net_showudp_oob
description: Dump OOB UDP packets summary to console

name: net_showudp_remoteonly
description: Dump non-loopback udp only

name: net_splitrate
description: Number of fragments for a splitpacket that can be sent per frame

name: net_splitrateDefaultMP
description: Default MP number of fragments for a splitpacket that can be sent per frame

name: net_splitrateDefaultSP
description: Default SP number of fragments for a splitpacket that can be sent per frame

name: net_wifi
description: 0 = ethernet, 1 = wifi, -1 = unknown

name: not_focus_sleep
description: MS to sleep while window doesn't have focus

name: nx_viewportscale_max_handheld
description: Sets the max viewportscale value on Switch handheld

name: nx_viewportscale_max_handheld_lobby
description: Sets the max viewportscale value on Switch handheld

name: nx_viewportscale_min_handheld
description: Sets the min viewportscale value on Switch handheld

name: nx_viewportscale_min_handheld_lobby
description: Sets the min viewportscale value on Switch handheld

name: party_userinfo_allowstale
description: If true, stale userinfo for party members will continue to be used until the new info is fetched

name: pin_opt_in
description: Enables sending PIN telemetry data to EA

name: pin_sid
description: Session ID

name: player_setting_autosprint
description: Automatically sprint when walking forward.

name: player_setting_damage_closes_deathbox_menu
description: Controls whether death box automatically closes when taking damage (used for menus).

name: player_setting_enable_heartbeat_sounds
description: Enables heartbeat sensor heartbeat sounds.

name: player_setting_stickysprintforward
description: Double-tapping sprint will keep the player sprinting forward.

name: reconnect_cache_delete
description: Allow / Disallow reconnect to remove cached reconnect params.

name: rtk_enableLaserScreen
description: Enable RTK version of LaserScreen, otherwise VGUI version is used

name: rtk_enableStatsScreen
description: Enable RTK version of StatsScreen, otherwise VGUI version is used

name: serverFilter
description: Only connects to servers with the same value

name: shadow_depth_dimen_min
description: Minimum resolution of a spot shadow map in width and height

name: shadow_depth_upres_factor_max
description: Maximum requested upres factor of spot shadows (dimen_min << this) == largest spot shadow dimen

name: shadow_lobby_player_intersect_scalar
description: Priority scalar for shadows in lobby whose cone intersects the player. (Lower is higher priority)

name: shadow_max_dynamic_lobby
description: Maximum number of shadows that should update every frame in Lobby.

name: shadow_maxdynamic
description: Maximum number of shadows that should update every frame.

name: showfps_max_ms
description: Maximum time in ms that will fit on the showfps graph.

name: showmem_mode_bottom
description: Mode 0 is total free memory(excluding garlic), 1 is small block heap, 2 is total small block heap, 3 is Client Script, 4 is UI Script, 5 is Server Script (on PC)

name: showmem_mode_top
description: Mode 0 is total free memory(excluding garlic), 1 is small block heap, 2 is total small block heap, 3 is Client Script, 4 is UI Script, 5 is Server Script (on PC)

name: sound_classic_music
description: classic music volume (float 0 – 2)

name: sound_num_speakers
description: 2 - headphones or stereo, 6 - 5.1 surround, 8 - 7.1 surround.  All other values invalid

name: sound_volume
description: master game volume (float 0 – 2)

name: sound_volume_dialogue
description: dialogue volume (mp) (float 0 – 2)

name: sound_volume_music_game
description: music volume in game (mp) (float 0 – 2)

name: sound_volume_music_lobby
description: music volume in lobby (float 0 – 2)

name: sound_volume_sfx
description: sound effect volume (mp) (float 0 – 2)

name: sound_volume_voice
description: voice chat volume (float 0 – 2)

name: sound_without_focus
description: Play sounds even when the app doesn't have focus.

name: stream_memory
description: Stream memory to target (in kb).

name: stream_memory_min
description: Minimum streaming memory (in kb).

name: stream_texture_bandwidth
description: Maximum bandwidth (in MB/s) to use for streaming. This should be lower than the GPU-CPU bus bandwidth (e.g. PCIe bus bandwidth).

name: sv_earlyPersistenceRead
description: Should the server try to read persistence earlier in the connection process\n

name: toggle_on_jump_to_deactivate
description: Toggle or release jump to deactivate the offhand weapon

name: toggle_on_jump_to_deactivate_changed
description: If Toggle or release jump to deactivate the offhand weapon changed by the player

name: twitch_drops
description: Entitlements user has received through the Twitch Drops program

name: twitch_drops_initialized
description: Whether the user has received any twitch drop info from stryder

name: twitch_prime_fulfillmentToken
description: Token for reporting Prime reward fulfillment

name: twitch_prime_rewards
description: Entitlements user has received through the Twitch Prime rewards program

name: use_eadp_shorthash
description: Hash the Nucleus ID to its short version (32 chars) instead of the long version (128 chars).

name: viewportscale
description: Scale down the main viewport (to reduce GPU impact on CPU profiling)

name: voice_enabled
description: Toggle voice transmit and receive.

name: voice_input_device
description: Voice capture device guid for directsound. empty = default capture device (will automatically reset voice on default changed)

name: voice_inputfromfile
description: Get voice input from 'voice_input.wav' rather than from the microphone.

name: voice_modenable
description: Enable/disable voice in this mod.

name: voice_recordtofile
description: Record mic data and decompressed voice data into 'voice_micdata.wav' and 'voice_decompressed.wav'

name: voice_vox
description: Voice chat uses a vox-style always on

name: watchdog_dialog
description: Show a dialog prompt (for PC). Default is 1 (enabled)

name: watchdog_sleep_time_milliseconds
description: Time watchdog thread to sleep in milliseconds.  Defaults to 1000 (1 second).

name: watchdog_time_milliseconds
description: Time for watchdog to wait without seeing a new frame presented before triggering a crash report, in milliseconds. Default is 0 (0 disables the feature)

name: XLOG_telemetry_shortcircuit
description: Allow customers to turn off xlog.
